title: Where's Hexakill?
body:
EU West just become avalaible and i joined to play some Hexakill but the Game mode isnt there :S

When?

replies.body: It hasn't been released yet. If you read the patch note properly you'd have noticed it said, and I quote, "Hexakill: Twisted Treeline will be making a return during patch 5.10" giving no specific time ***during*** patch 5.10 that it will become active.
It will come when OCE updates.

Bit later actually.
No specific time, but "somewhere during 5.10" usually means a few days after patch.
